entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:42 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
